name: Egg Fried Rice
description: Authentic fried rice plate with diced carrots, peas, bean sprouts, signature soy glaze, and eggs.

name: Halal Cart Chicken Platter
description: Diced halal chicken thighs, spicy red rice, fresh cucumber salad, and tzatziki.

name: Ground Beef Bulgogi
description: Rice dish topped with umami ground beef, red peppers, broccoli, and spring onion.

name: Creamy Cajun Chicken
description: Sliced chicken thigh with cajun seasonings, mashed potatoes, and creamy Alfredo sauce.

name: Honey-Soy Chicken & Rice
description: Chicken glazed with honey and soy sauce, served with rice, a sunny side up egg, and cucumber.

name: Beef Burrito
description: Signature ground beef, cilantro lime rice, black beans, lettuce, cheese, and homemade pico de gallo.

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: Toasted burrito with scrambled eggs, ground beef, cheese, and hot sauce.

name: Greek Yogurt Power Bowl
description: Healthy pick-me-up with vanilla greek yogurt, chia seeds, assorted fruits, and honey.

name: Royal Scrambled Eggs
description: Classic fluffy scrambled eggs, an everything bagel with cream cheese, and assorted fruits.
